pages.text: 2|2|2. Eta [1] se kitaba yate kono sandeha ne'i [2], muttakidera jan'ya [3] hedayeta
2|3|yara gayebera [1] prati imana ane [2], salata kayema kare [3] ebam taderake amara ya dana karechi ta theke byaya kare [4].
2|4|Ara yara imana ane tate ya apanara upara nayila kara hayeche ebam ya apanara purbe nayila kara hayeche [1], ara yara akherate niscita bisbasi [2].
2|5|Tara'i tadera rabera nirdesita hidayatera upara rayeche ebam tara'i saphalakama[1].
